Package fr.iutvalence.java.projet.spaceinvaders

Interface Summary
Display This interface defines the common primitive of all view class.
MonsterControler This interface defines all common method to control Monsters.
TankControler This interface is the control of the game.
 

Class Summary
ASCIIDisplay This class allows to print the state of the game into console.
BoundingBox The BoundingBox class define area.
Coordinates This class allows to use couple of integers as coordinates.
Element The element Class is the basic class of all drowable elements on the grid.
MonstersThread This thread loop until the game finish.
Movable This class defines a movable object, that can move on a 2D grid and so being killed by others.
SpaceInvaders This is abstract class who regroup all tools' methods and variable.
SpaceInvadersMaVa A space invader game.
SpaceInvadersMaVs A space invader game.
SpaceInvadersMsVs A space invader game.
SwingDisplay  
TanksThreads This thread loop until game finished.
 

Enum Summary
Etat This enumerate the state of invaders on the grid.
 

Exception Summary
NegativeSizeException Thrown when only positive coordinates are expected.
OutOfGridException Thrown when movable objects go over the grid.
